TEXT.TITLE: NEW PLAN REALTY TRUST <NPR> 2ND QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Qtr ends Jan 31 Shr 22 cts vs 19 cts Net 4,549,000 vs 3,666,000 Revs 8,903,000 vs 7,791,000 Avg shrs 20.9 mln vs 19.9 mln Six mths Shr 42 cts vs 41 cts Net 8,641,000 vs 7,928,000 Revs 17.5 mln vs 14.6 mln Avg shrs 20.8 mln vs 19.4 mln NOTE: earnings were restated to reflect the three-for-two stock split on April one, 1986.
